page.title: 07RECREATION IN ARBROATH.
page.content: In my area there is a passable amount to do for passing{recreation}and leisure time.In the winter you can go for a walk down to the West Links or play in one of the nearby parks.You can also enjoy the view because,in Arbroath,the local{population}is never more than quarter of a mile from the shoreline or from open countryside. Quite often in winter Keptie Pond is frozen and you can actually walk across it to the small island in the middle where the ducks nest.I have seen people skating on the pond although I think that this is a dangerous thing to do.In summer people find their{entertainment}by paddling in the sea or paddling pool.
